name: Drop Dead Gorgeous
description:
Sage with warm cedarwood will calm and balance your mind. Earthy. Woodsy.  


These are NOT melt and pour soaps! Hand made in small batches using old time cold process method. Luxurious, long lasting soaps with nourishing hempseed oil & shea and cocoa butter to moisturize and soothe your skin. Fragranced with the finest essential oils and dried botanicals to gently exfoliate. Generous 6 ounce bars are individually hand packaged in beautiful papers. A lovely and extravagant gift for yourself..or someone you love. Free from sodium laurel sulphate, parabens and petroleum distillate.
